argument.name: refresh_interval
argument.description: Default = 0.5. Specifies, in seconds, how often the display should be updated. Minimum is 0.1 seconds.

section.warning: No user interface related commands are allowed in a thread. Using any command that attempts to create or manipulate any type of user interface from within a thread will cause Alpha Anywhere to hang. Examples of such invalid functions include debug() , ui_*, StatusBar.*, ControlPanel.*, trace.*, etc.
